message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Alice, $22,000 is way above my budget. I'm very interested in the product, but I can't go higher than $10,000. This is a fair price considering the value to me. Let me know what you think.
Bob, thanks for your interest. While $10,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $18,000.  I believe this reflects the true value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $18,000, but that's still a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to go to $12,000, which is a significant increase from my last offer. This is the absolute highest I can go. Let me know if you're open to it.
